    • Method Detail

      • setUpfireAlarmIndicatorLabel

        public void setUpfireAlarmIndicatorLabel()
        Setup the room temperature sensor indicator. It shows yellow color when temperature sensor is activated. otherwise white.

      • setUpsensorIndicatorLabel

        public void setUpsensorIndicatorLabel()
        Setup the room motion sensor indicator. It shows green color when motion sensor is activated. otherwise white.
